程序包 model.mapping

类 CourseMapping

java.lang.Object
model.mapping.CourseMapping
public class CourseMapping
extends java.lang.Object
Map Course data to JSON database. This "JSON database" is a self-defined database and it should only be used in this software.

Offering add, delete and find methods for course data. In this class, we use JSON to manage our Course POJO.

从以下版本开始:
15 May 2021
版本:
1.2
作者:
Yubo Wu
另请参阅:
JSON, Course

    Delete Course data from JSON database.

    Find Course from JSON database, and return the results to a ArrayList.

    Read DATA_PATH to the program and convert it to POJO using fastJSON.

    • DATA_PATH

      public static final java.lang.String DATA_PATH
      Course JSON database path
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

    • SUCCESS

      public static final int SUCCESS
      Operation success status code
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

    • DUPLICATE_ID

      public static final int DUPLICATE_ID
      Duplicate Course ID
      另请参阅:
      常量字段值

    • COURSE_NOT_FOUND

      public static final int COURSE_NOT_FOUND
      Cannot found Course in database

  • 构造器详细资料

    • CourseMapping

      public CourseMapping()

  • 方法详细资料

    • add

      public static int add​(Course course) throws java.io.IOException
      Add Course data to JSON database.
      参数:
      course - instance of Course
      返回:
      status code: SUCCESS or DUPLICATE_ID.
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - when IO issue occur

    • delete

      public static int delete​(int id) throws java.io.IOException
      Delete Course data from JSON database.
      参数:
      id - Course ID
      返回:
      SUCCESS or COURSE_NOT_FOUND.
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - when IO issue occur

    • find

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Course> find​(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> map) throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Find Course from JSON database, and return the results to a ArrayList. The parameter are HashMap, you need to put all AND conditions in hashmap. This find method can't handle other conditions except AND, like OR or BETWEEN or others.
      参数:
      map - the WHERE conditions are represented by K-V pairs using HashMap
      返回:
      ArrayList contained results.
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - when DATA_PATH not found

    • readAllCourse

      public static java.util.ArrayList<Course> readAllCourse() throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
      Read DATA_PATH to the program and convert it to POJO using fastJSON.
      返回:
      all data in DATA_PATH
      抛出:
      java.io.FileNotFoundException - when DATA_PATH not found

    • writeAll

      private static void writeAll​(java.util.ArrayList<Course> courses) throws java.io.IOException
      Write all Course in ArrayList to the file using fastJSON. This method will overwrite the DATA_PATH file, so this method is set to be private to protect the data.
      参数:
      courses - the Course data that you want to write
      抛出:
      java.io.IOException - when IO issue occur
